trans-unit.source: git push is used with --force-with-lease so if the server and you have a different understanding of that branch, it is not deleted.
trans-unit.target: git push 与 --force-with-lease 一起使用，因此，如果服务器和您对该分支有不同的了解，则不会删除该分支。

trans-unit.source: A convenient command-line tool helping you keep repositories clean.
trans-unit.target: 一个方便的命令行工具,帮助你保持存储库的清洁。

trans-unit.source: Best Practices
trans-unit.target: 最佳做法

trans-unit.source: Command-line tool to delete merged Git branches
trans-unit.target: 删除合并Git分支的命令行工具

trans-unit.source: Confirmation defaults to "no"; plain [Enter]/[Return] does not delete.
trans-unit.target: 确认默认为“否”；普通 [Enter] / [Return] 不会删除。

trans-unit.source: Consider keeping your fork's remote master up to date (using git push).
trans-unit.target: 考虑使fork的远程 master 保持最新（使用 git push ）。

trans-unit.source: Deletion is a sharp knife that requires care. While git reflog would have your back in most cases, git-delete-merged-branches takes safety seriously.
trans-unit.target: 删除是一把锋利的刀，需要小心。虽然在大多数情况下 git reflog 会让您失望，但 git-delete-merged-branches 非常重视安全性。

trans-unit.source: Detects multiple forms of de-facto merges (rebase merges, squash merges (needs --effort=3), single or range cherry-picks… leveraging git cherry)
trans-unit.target: 检测多种形式的实际合并（ --effort=3 合并，壁球合并（需要--effort = 3），单个或范围内的樱桃点…利用 git cherry ）

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 例子

trans-unit.source: Features
trans-unit.target: 特点

trans-unit.source: Here's what git-delete-merged-branches does for your safety:
trans-unit.target: 这是 git-delete-merged-branches 为了您的安全所做的事情：

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Like this tool? Support it with a star!
trans-unit.target: 喜欢这个工具吗?请用星星支持它

trans-unit.source: Make sure that release branches are tracking the right remote, e.g. master should probably track original upstream's master rather than master of your fork.
trans-unit.target: 确保发布分支正在跟踪正确的远程站点，例如 master 可能应该跟踪原始上游的 master 而不是fork的 master 。

trans-unit.source: Name clash on "git-delete-merged-branches" with git-extras
trans-unit.target: git-extras与 "git-delete-merged-branches "名称冲突。

trans-unit.source: No branches are deleted without confirmation or passing --yes.
trans-unit.target: 未经确认或传递 --yes 不会删除任何分支。

trans-unit.source: Please report any bugs that you find.
trans-unit.target: 请报告你发现的任何错误。

trans-unit.source: Provider agnostic: Works with GitHub, GitLab, Gitea and any other Git hosting
trans-unit.target: 供应商不可知:可与GitHub、GitLab、Gitea和其他Git托管服务协同工作

trans-unit.source: Quick interactive configuration
trans-unit.target: 快速交互式配置

trans-unit.source: Safety
trans-unit.target: 安全方面

trans-unit.source: Show any Git commands run using --verbose.
trans-unit.target: 显示使用 --verbose 运行的所有Git命令。

trans-unit.source: Support
trans-unit.target: 技术支持

trans-unit.source: Supports deletion of both local and remote branches
trans-unit.target: 支持删除本地和远程分支

trans-unit.source: Supports workflows with multiple release branches, e.g. only delete branches that have been merged to all of master, dev and staging
trans-unit.target: 支持工作流有多个版本分支，例如，仅已合并到删除分支所有的 master ， dev 和 staging

trans-unit.source: Takes safety seriously
trans-unit.target: 认真对待安全问题

trans-unit.source: There is no use of os.system or shell code to go wrong.
trans-unit.target: 没有使用 os.system 或shell代码会出错。

trans-unit.source: To address this conflict you can:
trans-unit.target: 为了解决这个冲突,你可以:

trans-unit.source: Utility collection git-extras provides a simple shell script named git-delete-merged-branches that competes for command git-delete-merged-branches when both software packages are installed.
trans-unit.target: 实用程序集合git-extras提供了一个 简单的名为 git-delete-merged-branches 的shell脚本 ，当同时安装了两个软件包时，该脚本会竞争 git-delete-merged-branches 命令。

trans-unit.source: When the repository is a fork (with an upstream remote and a fork remote):
trans-unit.target: 当仓库是一个fork(有一个上游远程和一个fork远程)。

trans-unit.source: When using GitHub:
trans-unit.target: 当使用GitHub。

trans-unit.source: With --dry-run you can get a feel for the changes that git-delete-merged-branches would be making to your branches.
trans-unit.target: 使用 --dry-run ,您可以感觉到 git-delete-merged-branches 将对您的分支进行的更改。

trans-unit.source: You can make GitHub delete branches of merged pull requests for you, to save git-delete-merged-branches some work on the remote side, if you like.
trans-unit.target: 您可以让GitHub 为您删除合并的合并请求 git-delete-merged-branches ，如果需要，可以在远程保存git-delete-merged-branches的一些工作。

trans-unit.source: a) Invoke python3 -m git_delete_merged_branches instead of git-delete-merged-branches
trans-unit.target: a）调用 python3 -m git_delete_merged_branches 而不是 git-delete-merged-branches

trans-unit.source: b) Invoke command git-dmb instead of git-delete-merged-branches
trans-unit.target: b）调用命令 git-dmb 而不是 git-delete-merged-branches

trans-unit.source: c) Control path resolution order through environment variable $PATH
trans-unit.target: c）通过环境变量 $PATH 控制路径解析顺序

trans-unit.source: d) Invoke git-delete-merged-branches with its absolute path. You can run which -a git-delete-merged-branches to see where it's located.
trans-unit.target: d）使用其绝对路径调用 git-delete-merged-branches 。您可以运行 which -a git-delete-merged-branches 来查看它的位置。

trans-unit.source: git-delete-merged-branches
trans-unit.target: git-delete-merged-branches
